title: Is Porn Bad For You? | Effects Of Watching Pornography

Your brain’s Limbic system, the reward center, is responsible for making you feel pleasure

or simply eating your favorite meal.
You see, the hormones Dopamine and Glutamate are both released in a regulated dose whenever

the body remember the experience.
What does porn do to alter this function?
